projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: TusInversiones -  All your investments in one place
projects.bodyText:
- Final project of the Systems Engineering degree.
 - Application that integrates all investments from both brokers and exchanges in one place. A training portal for beginning investors and an educational library were developed.
 - Integration with **Invertir Online**, **Binance** and **Coinbase**. 
 - Web application made with **React Js**, API Backend made with **.Net**. Deployed in **Azure** Cloud.
